summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Forty-seventh Street from the east margin of 14th Avenue N.W. to the west margin of 17th Avenue N. W. in the City of Seattle, by planking same under Ordinance No. 19014, creating Local Improvement District No. 1822 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
